chunk:
Brandless Depuffing Eye Gel (2019 formulation)

Brand: Brandless

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Coconut Alkanes, Cetearyl Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 60, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glyceryl Stearate, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Punica Granatum Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitol, C

ethanol, Sorbitol, Caprylyl Glycol, Cetyl Esters, Dimethicone, Coco-Caprylate/ Caprate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Lactobacillus Ferment, Caffeine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Spinacia Oleracea (Spinach) Leaf Extract, Citric Acid.

Directions: After cleansing face, apply gel around the eye area. Using fingertips, gently pat or massage in until absorb

sage in until absorbed

Warnings: For external use only. Avoid getting in the eye. Discontinue use if skin irritation occurs.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
